data.name: Furry Futanari: 3 in 1 ⚧🏳️‍🌈 Soundtrack
data.detailed_description: The soundtrack includes all mission loading tracks from the game, victory cues, the three action cues for puzzles, and a handful of bonus cues from Furry Futanari: 3 in 1 ⚧🏳️‍🌈
data.about_the_game: The soundtrack includes all mission loading tracks from the game, victory cues, the three action cues for puzzles, and a handful of bonus cues from Furry Futanari: 3 in 1 ⚧🏳️‍🌈
data.short_description: Immerse yourself into the world of Furry Futanari: 3 in 1 ⚧🏳️‍🌈 with the incredible original soundtrack. Furry Futanari: 3 in 1- original soundtrack includes all tracks for your listening pleasure. All tracks are provided in MP3 format

content_descriptors.notes:
This game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work.
The game contains sexual content: sexy girls, clothing, sexual acts.
It does not contains sexual violence, drug abuse, or self-harm.
All characters are over the age of 18.
